text: Takkha nangni chungnga kei'n kizootmak lekkhat om: nangni karra miring lekkhat Balaam minchuna kajui ningom, minchuna kachu Balak kha Israel mi ngaikha manu thonasik ah raikhuo ramil ngaidiang inpeii bu kha Israel mi ngaikha minbakli zool-inthai chuon minthonasik inminchu. Teelna 22:5,7; 31:16; Innidan 23:4; Isa 62:2; 65:15
